title: A discourse concerning the idolatry practised in the Church of Rome and the danger of salvation in the communion of it in an answer to some papers of a revolted Protestant : wherein a particular account is given of the fanaticism and divisions of that church / by Edward Stilingfleet.
author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
publisher: Printed by Robert White for Henry Mortlock,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
